channel.title: What would i changege

item.title: What would i changege
item.dc:creator: @LeScape LeScape
item.description:
@LeScape wrote:

Create a boolean to return true within coordinates.

public boolean someBool() {
if (absX >= int && is absY >= int && if absX <= int && if absY <= int) {
return true;
}
return false;
}

Then, under the first line of the void you would add:

if (!someBool()) {

and you would add one more closing bracket:

}

At the end of the void. Also, removing the [u]resetItems(int) part will not work because that is not what removes your items. The loops are what removes your items, which is why we must call them within an if-then.

Read full topic

item.title: What would i changege
item.dc:creator: @gs1 gs
item.description:
@gs1 wrote:

in this w/e u wanna call it void to make it so you dont lose items

[code]public void removeAllItems2() {
	for (int i = 0; i < playerItems.length; i++) {
		playerItems[i] = 0;
	}
	for (int i = 0; i < playerItemsN.length; i++) {
		playerItemsN[i] = 0;
	}
	resetItems(3214);
}[/code]

[code]removeAllItems2(); teleportToX = 3086; teleportToY = 3501; //pEmote = 15; //pWalk = 13; sendMessage("Oh dear you are dead!"); setSkillLevel(3, 100, playerLevel[3]); currentHealth = 100; hitDiff = 0; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } }[/code]
